text: Maiṅ chāhtā hūṅ ki āp sab ġhairzabāneṅ boleṅ, lekin is se zyādā yih ḳhāhish rakhtā hūṅ ki āp nabuwwat kareṅ. Nabuwwat karne wālā ġhairzabāneṅ bolne wāle se aham hai. Hāṅ, ġhairzabāneṅ bolne wālā bhī aham hai basharteki apnī zabān kā tarjumā kare, kyoṅki is se Ḳhudā kī jamāt kī tāmīr-o-taraqqī hotī hai.
